description: A PHP script handling AJAX requests to add or modify network device reservations (static IP and MAC address management) and device details such as hostname and comments. Includes validation functions for IP and MAC addresses and interacts with configuration via getStr / setStr functions.

methods.name: isIPValid
methods.description: Validates if an input IP address is within acceptable ranges based on current LAN configuration and reserves, and checks for conflicts with existing DHCP and static reservations.
